name: BOMB FINGERS!
description:
AGENT!!! THERE IS A BOMB IN FRONT OF US AND YOUR ARE THE ONLY ONE THAT CAN DEFUSE IT. HURRY AND READ THE FINGER MANUAL AND GET READY.

Finger Manual

Step One - Read what your boss tells you to do.

Step Two - Select a finger that you want to move by pressing the corresponding number. (1 is the left most finger and 0 is the right most finger)

Step Three - Press the Key you want that finger you just selected to press. (SPACE BAR will take your finger off the key)

Step Four - Remember which finger is pressing which key

Step Five - Defuse the bomb!
